tool_description: Analyzes ingredient combinations for flavor compatibility using culinary principles, suggesting complementary additions and identifying potential conflicts.

primary_ingredients.description: Main ingredients that form the base of the dish

secondary_ingredients.description: Supporting ingredients like herbs, spices, and aromatics

flavor_profile_goal.description: Desired flavor profile: savory, sweet, spicy, tangy, umami, balanced

cuisine_style.description: Cuisine style to match flavor principles

error_messages: Insufficient primary ingredients: Provide at least 2 primary ingredients for meaningful flavor analysis.
Unrecognized flavor profile: Use one of [savory, sweet, spicy, tangy, umami, balanced].
Invalid cuisine style: Use recognized cuisine names like Italian, Asian, Mediterranean, Mexican, etc., or fusion.
Ingredient not recognized: Some ingredients may not be in the flavor database - use common ingredient names.
usage: Provide primary ingredients and optionally secondary ingredients. Specify desired flavor profile and cuisine style. The tool evaluates compatibility and suggests improvements.

flavor_balance.description: Analysis of the current flavor balance (sweet, salty, sour, bitter, umami)

complementary_additions.description: Suggested ingredients to enhance flavor harmony

enhancement_suggestions.description: Specific recommendations for improving flavor profile
